    • Field Detail

      • maxRelativeMotion

        protected double maxRelativeMotion
        Maximum assumed motion relative to the camera (or mask) dimension. Larger motion should register as no template match, and max out.

      • minMotionTemplateMatchScore

        protected double minMotionTemplateMatchScore
        Minimum motion template image matching score.

      • minContrastRange

        protected double minContrastRange
        Minimum image channel (brightness) range for contrast enhancement.
